title: Fit series of linear regression models to multiple responses with shared design matrix — lmFitResponses
code: library(DelayedArray) n <- 100 m <- 5 nc <- 2 set.seed(1) Y <- matrix(rnorm(n * m), m, n) Y <- DelayedArray(Y) X <- matrix(rnorm(n * nc), n, nc) rownames(Y) <- seq(m) W <- matrix(runif(n * m), m, n)  # fit regressions with model j using Y[j,] as a response fit <- lmFitResponses(Y, X, W) #>  Models fit: 1    Models fit: 2    Models fit: 3    Models fit: 4    Models fit: 5    # # examine results lapply(fit, head, 2) #> $coef #>         [,1]        [,2] #> 1 -0.2167269 -0.26282250 #> 2  0.1217050  0.08171999 #>  #> $se #>         [,1]       [,2] #> 1 0.09798615 0.08866582 #> 2 0.09649571 0.08894915 #>  #> $dispersion #>         1         2  #> 0.4200639 0.4111836  #>  #> $rdf #>  1  2  #> 98 98  #>  #> $family #> [1] "gaussian" #>
